properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL.
DNC 01.
FISHERMAN MISSING FROM VESSEL ON 23 JUL
IN AREA BOUND BY
05-04.0S 036-40.6W, 04-56.3S 036-38.2W,
04-49.0S 036-51.5W, 04-56.0S 036-54.5W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO ANY COASTAL RADIO STATION.
